/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the rich history and culture of the city. Cars and buses are seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The colors in the image are mostly gray and green, reflecting the blend of modernity and nature that characterizes Beijing.
